short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Life Chart' is a visual reminder of how precious life is and fuels your commitment to living a long, well-lived life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- How much time do you have left?
 - How many years do you want to extend your healthspan and lifespan by? 
 - What will you do with your remaining years?
 - How will you be remembered?

The Longevity Box 'Life Chart' is a visual reminder of how precious life is. It appears every time you open a new tab in Chrome and fuels your commitment to living a long, well-lived life.

With the Life Chart, you can:
 - Input your DOB, country of birth and gender to determine your expected lifespan based on World Health Organization data.
 - Add a target lifespan (beyond the above-predetermined data) to visualise the age you are targeting to live to.
 - Add details of how you want to be remembered in your funeral eulogy thus reminding you to live these values every day
 - Add details of how you intend to make the most of the extra years you are adding to your life by optimising your health and being focused on Longevity and healthspan.
